course_description: This course will explore issues that arise at the intersection of law and emerging technologies. It will include consideration of a range of different technological developments, including advances in genetics, artificial intelligence, and the expanding use of algorithms and big data. It will examine the ways in which these technological developments and their use challenge the existing legal and regulatory framework.
